titleproper.value: "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" Broadway Theatre Show Programs and Ephemera<lb/>2018<lb/> <num>AHMC -Harry Potter</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-08-20T01:35:22</date>

unittitle.value: "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" Broadway theatre show programs and ephemera

abstract.value:
The Showbill theatre programs of April 2018 for "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child: Part One" and "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child: Part Two"; a set of two tickets for the official Broadway opening on Sunday, April 22, 2018, of the two part Harry Potter play; a pass to the party at Cipriani 42nd Street event space held after the evening performance of Part Two; and the envelope holding the tickets and pass.<lb/> <lb/>

To request this material for research, and for fuller information about it, please follow this link to the record in N-YHS's catalog, Bobcat: <extref actuate="onRequest" href="http://bobcat.library.nyu.edu/primo-explore/fulldisplay?docid=nyu_aleph007384356&context=L&vid=NYHS&search_scope=nyhs&tab=nyhs&lang=en_US">"Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" Broadway theatre show programs and ephemera</extref>.
